SESSION_ID.description: Ensure your session Id starts with the word CHRIST-AI~$

MODE.description: Set to 'public' or 'private' to define bot mode

PREFIX.description: paste your bot prefix note! Don't apply null prefix.

OWNER_NAME.description: Your name as the bot owner

AUTO_TYPING.description: Enable bot to show typing status (true/false)

AUTO_RECORDING.description: Enable bot to show recording status (true/false)

AUTO_REACT.description: Enable bot to auto-react to messages (true/false)

AUTO_STATUS_REPLY.description: Enable bot to reply after viewing a status (true/false)

STATUS_READ_MSG.description: Set the message bot sends after viewing a status

AUTO_BIO.description: make it true if you want the bot to update de bio after restart

AUTO_BLOCK.description: Enable bot to auto-block specific numbers (true/false)

REJECT_CALL.description: Enable bot to reject incoming calls (true/false)
